title: Mohd Amirul Izwan Yaacob
text:
Mohd Amirul Izwan Yaacob (born 25 April 1986) is a <a href="Malaysia">Malaysia</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Referee%20%28association%20football%29">referee</a>. He has been a full international for <a href="FIFA">FIFA</a> since 2012.
Career.
Amirul Izwan Yaacob started the professional refereeing in 2011 and was awarded his FIFA badge in 2012.
He refereed some matches in <a href="AFC%20Champions%20League">AFC Champions League</a> and <a href="AFC%20Cup">AFC Cup</a>.
In 2015, he was selected for the <a href="U-17%20World%20Cup">U-17 World Cup</a> in Chile.
In the end of season 2019, he was invited to be referee 2 matches in <a href="2019%20V.League%201">2019 V.League 1</a> in the two last round.
